86b5('dul ba): kyi phung po 'bar ba zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan
86b6('dul ba): snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mchis so snyam mo/ /'od srung cing me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga me la yongs
86b7('dul ba): su mi spyod de/ de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/
87a1('dul ba): de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar ba bzhi po de dag nas snga ma bzhin du me'i phung po chen po lnga pa de 'bar ba nas me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya
87a2('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di
87a3('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas
87a4('dul ba): 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab bo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od
87a5('dul ba): srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de ltar
87a6('dul ba): ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod kyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi
87a7('dul ba): sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do/ /de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung bas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang
87b1('dul ba): ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin de zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir bdag la zhag bdun
87b2('dul ba): du rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de yang
87b3('dul ba): de la longs spyod du gzhug go snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas
87b4('dul ba): 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung / 'ongs so/ /dge
87b5('dul ba): sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slang du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du bzhud lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis
87b6('dul ba): dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis/ kye ma dge
87b7('dul ba): sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyed kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo / /'o na ci'i
88a1('dul ba): slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi ma chod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas/ 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung
88a2('dul ba): zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod
88a3('dul ba): du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ dge sbyong chen po de lta lags so/ /nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no/ /dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar longs spyad
88a4('dul ba): du gsol/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa
88a5('dul ba): yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/
88a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs sheg dang bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro/ /bcom
88a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas/ bcom ldan
88b1('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par
88b2('dul ba): dgongs su gsol/ 'od srung de'i phyir song zhig /nga yang 'ong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs
88b3('dul ba): mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams
88b4('dul ba): te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og
88b5('dul ba): tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad
88b6('dul ba): ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs
88b7('dul ba): mnyam par bzhag na/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa
89a1('dul ba): de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig / dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung
89a2('dul ba): ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /'dzam bu'i snye ma ji lta
89a3('dul ba): bar skyu ru ra'i snye ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas/ lteng rgyas
89a4('dul ba): 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
89a5('dul ba): can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung / 'ongs so/ /dge
89a6('dul ba): sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs
89a7('dul ba): nas/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis/ gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig /dge sbyong chen
89b1('dul ba): po ci bde kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra
89b2('dul ba): bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su gshegs nas lha'i bdud rtsis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng
89b3('dul ba): rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshing tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang nyid kyis g.yos byas nas/ bcom
89b4('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par
89b5('dul ba): dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der
89b6('dul ba): gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba
89b7('dul ba): bca' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi
90a1('dul ba): bya ba mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus
90a2('dul ba): chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod ma chen po zhig
90a3('dul ba): byung ste chu 'bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na 'chag pa na/ bkod ma chen po byung ste/ chu 'bab
90a4('dul ba): pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni med na chu 'di da lta gang nas bab snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das
90a5('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod
90a6('dul ba): ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni ma mchis na/ da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam du bgyid do/ /'od srung 'dir
90a7('dul ba): khyod las ngas bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te/ zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na/ nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
90b1('dul ba): byin gyis nga la chu sa chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas phyogs 'dir lag pa sa la bsnun pa las/ de nas bkod ma chen po byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad de/ 'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag
90b2('dul ba): pas brkos pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra
90b3('dul ba): bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red
90b4('dul ba): nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag
90b5('dul ba): ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas 'byung bar bzhed pa na/ shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo / /de nas ardzu
90b6('dul ba): na'i yal ga chen po 'dud par gyur te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na/ rdzing lag
90b7('dul ba): pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po'i 'dud pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur na/ ardzu na'i yal
91a1('dul ba): ga chen po 'di su zhig gis btud snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
91a2('dul ba): ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa mthong
91a3('dul ba): ngo| |mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur na/ da 'di su zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung nga 'dir phye ma red nang du
91a4('dul ba): yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig na na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag
91a5('dul ba): ste| rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te/ lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas 'byung bar 'dod nas shing ardzu na 'di gang na ba de logs su lag pa brkyang pa dang / de nas
91a6('dul ba): a rdzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di 'dud par gyur te/ de la nga 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /'od srung shing 'di ni ardzu na lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas
91a7('dul ba): 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan
91b1('dul ba): 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag rnyed nas/ de nas bcom ldan
91b2('dul ba): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri brag
91b3('dul ba): cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha
91b4('dul ba): na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te nga'i phyag dar khrod
91b5('dul ba): pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas/ brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba
91b6('dul ba): zhig khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram
91b7('dul ba): du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo / /
92a1('dul ba): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khyer te 'ong snyam mo/ /de nas
92a2('dul ba): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir
92a3('dul ba): bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag cig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ma mchis na rdo leb che la ring
92a4('dul ba): ba 'di dag da su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag cig rnyed do/ /de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyag dar khrod
92a5('dul ba): pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te/ nga gang na ba
92a6('dul ba): der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras
92a7('dul ba): rnams bkrus so/ /nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i
92b1('dul ba): dgongs pa shes nas/ brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba gzhan zhig blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dir phyag dar khrod
92b2('dul ba): pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo/ /'od srung rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng
92b3('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom
92b4('dul ba): ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ne rany+dza na chu cher brug nas bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi
92b5('dul ba): gang bas lhag pas khengs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen
92b6('dul ba): po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po brug pas khyer ba ma gyur grang / ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal lo snyam du bsams nas/ shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan
92b7('dul ba): 'das btsal pa na/ lteng rgyas na 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khengs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa na/ 'chag pas 'chag
93a1('dul ba): par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gson nam/ 'od srung gson no/ /dge sbyong chen po zhugs
93a2('dul ba): shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srung 'jug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji
93a3('dul ba): lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji
93a4('dul ba): lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu
93a5('dul ba): che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas/
93a6('dul ba): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma
93a7('dul ba): yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis
93b1('dul ba): bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung
93b2('dul ba): ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge
93b3('dul ba): sbyong chen po/ ma bltas lags so/ /'od srung de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig /'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes nyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la bltas
93b4('dul ba): pa legs pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang yin pa der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag shes
93b5('dul ba): par gyis shig / bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba
93b6('dul ba): de thams cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lags pas/ gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab
93b7('dul ba): tu 'byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung ne rany+dza na'i nang
94a1('dul ba): du 'or cig / mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs
94a2('dul ba): gzar rnams chu klung ne rany+dza na'i nang du bor nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po
94a3('dul ba): 'di ltar bdag cag gis bgyi pa gang lags pa de bgyis lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
94a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen
94a5('dul ba): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung tshur shog /tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /de nyid
94a6('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srung
94a7('dul ba): dang / ga ya 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dag /chu klung ne rany+dza na'i mjug gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ /chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung
94b1('dul ba): spun gyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar de dag chu klung ne rany+dza nas khyer bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
94b2('dul ba): bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po'am/ chom rkun nam/ me'am/ chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag cag gis tshangs pa mtshungs
94b3('dul ba): par spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo/ /de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can tshol zhing / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang
94b4('dul ba): na ba der dong ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dir 'khod
94b5('dul ba): do| |chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung spun gyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo / /
94b6('dul ba): mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'od srung ral pa can 'di ni mchog yin la/ de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung dag 'di ni mchog
94b7('dul ba): yin te de ni ma yin no/ /de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang
95a1('dul ba): mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ ma ga d+ha'i
95a2('dul ba): mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar
95a3('dul ba): khas blangs kyis/ ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong
95a4('dul ba): chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan
95a5('dul ba): sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyed kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so/ /'od srung dag de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig /'di ltar
95a6('dul ba): khyed lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no/ /de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung spun rang gi bsti gnas
95a7('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig /kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par
95b1('dul ba): spyad pa spyod na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags kyis/ gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i
95b2('dul ba): spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus da yin par shes par gyis shig /de nas chu klung
95b3('dul ba): 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung spun gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dag / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong
95b4('dul ba): chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
95b5('dul ba): 'thob pa lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung dag/ tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab
95b6('dul ba): tu byung ba dang des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong po de rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng
95b7('dul ba): rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga ya gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ga yar byon nas ga ya na ga ya mgo'i mchod rten na sngon gyi ral
96a1('dul ba): pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la/ rdzu 'phrul
96a2('dul ba): rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu
96a3('dul ba): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ nyid kyis gdan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng
96a4('dul ba): gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad do/ /me'i ting
96a5('dul ba): nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par
96a6('dul ba): mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog go /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas
96a7('dul ba): 'bar bar mdzad la sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/ /sku'i stod na 'bar bar mdzad la sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
96b1('dul ba): la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul
96b2('dul ba): mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no/ /de
96b3('dul ba): la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o/ /khyed kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o/ /'di
96b4('dul ba): ni rtogs shig / 'di ni ma rtogs shig /'di ni yid la byos shig /'di ni yid la ma byed cig /'di ni spongs shig /'di ni ma spangs shig /'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la
96b5('dul ba): rdzogs par gyis te nos shig / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag 'di thams
96b6('dul ba): cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ /dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag mig dang gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun
96b7('dul ba): tu 'bar ba yin zhing mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu
97a1('dul ba): 'bar ba yin no/ /dge slong dag rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu
97a2('dul ba): 'bar ba yin zhing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang
97a3('dul ba): kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ /gang gis kun tu 'bar zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
97a4('dul ba): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ste/ sdug bsngal gyi kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o/ /de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
97a5('dul ba): rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de rnams len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
97a6('dul ba): par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ga ya na ga ya mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/
97a7('dul ba): byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu
97b1('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti
97b2('dul ba): gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te/ khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/
97b3('dul ba): chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang /
97b4('dul ba): glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yin no/ /de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung
97b5('dul ba): bar 'gyur te/ dpa' ba brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe
97b6('dul ba): ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par bab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig
97b7('dul ba): bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam
98a1('dul ba): par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ma ga d+ha'i
98a2('dul ba): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu
98a3('dul ba): b o skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te khyim na
98a4('dul ba): gnas na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas bdun pa blon po rin po cher 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar
98a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
98a6('dul ba): bgos nas zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos so zhes bya ba'i gong ma bzhin du'o/ /lha de khum zhig /lha bas gtso bas ches gtso
98a7('dul ba): bor 'gyur du mchi'o/ /grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba zhes bya
98b1('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te khyim par gyur te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
98b2('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
98b3('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba de lha khum zhig / lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra zhig /de ci'i
98b4('dul ba): phyir zhe na/ grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o/ /gal te skra dang kha spu
98b5('dul ba): bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du
98b6('dul ba): sgra rnam par grags par gyur na/ de'i nyan thos su khas blang bar bya'o/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon
98b7('dul ba): par byed de/ kye ma bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig
99a1('dul ba): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir
99a2('dul ba): bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing /
99a3('dul ba): bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
99a4('dul ba): gzugs can snying po de/ steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon par byed de/ kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
99a5('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi
99a6('dul ba): ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos
99a7('dul ba): bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing / bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
99b1('dul ba): can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag cig ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i sti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring pa zhig tu byung
99b2('dul ba): ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de skra dang
99b3('dul ba): k ha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med pa rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
99b4('dul ba): de ga ya na ga ya mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa dang / khur bor ba/ bdag gi don
99b5('dul ba): rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i
99b6('dul ba): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag
99b7('dul ba): cag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skra dang kha spu bregs
100a1('dul ba): t e gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
100a2('dul ba): par sangs rgyas nas/ de ga ya na ga ya mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral ba can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i
100a3('dul ba): shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ lha/ de la bkur bsti mdzod cig dang / de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor
100a4('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa'e nang rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la song nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis
100a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba dang sku nyams dang ldan nam
100a6('dul ba): reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig / bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms
100a7('dul ba): dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig /lha bka'
100b1('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la
100b2('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mi des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
100b3('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'i mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste snyun gsol lags so/ /kye
100b4('dul ba): mi khyod dang / ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas 'di skad ces bdag bcom
100b5('dul ba): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis
100b6('dul ba): bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas mi des
100b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
101a1('dul ba): s ngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin
101a2('dul ba): t u rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal na
101a3('dul ba): yod pa gang na ba der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal na yod pa na
101a4('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/
101a5('dul ba): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal na yod pa gang
101a6('dul ba): na ba der gshegs te/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal na yod pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/
101a7('dul ba): 'khor brgya phrag du ma rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na de'i shing rta'i 'khor lo sa'i nang
101b1('dul ba): du bying bar gyur to/ /des bsams pa/ bdag gis las skyon can cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod
101b2('dul ba): kyis khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag btson ra na 'dug gis de dag thon cig / rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du
101b3('dul ba): bcug go / yang rgyal po phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go /des yang bsams pa/ bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te/ des na bdag la
101b4('dul ba): ltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo/ /lha de rnams kyis yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyis khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyod
101b5('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus/ kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbron cig /rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i
101b6('dul ba): tshogs thams cad bkug go / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang / zhabs 'bring ba rta pa'i tshogs khri brgyad stong dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag
101b7('dul ba): brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo / /de ji tsam bzhon pa'i
102a1('dul ba): sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/ bzhon pa las bab nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying
102a2('dul ba): pos thag gi tsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang gdugs dang ral gri dang nor bu'i rnga yab dang / lham khra bo rnams phud do// //
102a3('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po gya dgu pa/ de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bla gos
102a4('dul ba): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ rang gi ming nas phyung ste lan gsum du gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+ha'i
102a5('dul ba): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/ /btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/ /rgyal po lags so/ /rgyal po chen po de de
102a6('dul ba): bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no/ /rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po
102a7('dul ba): yin no/ /rgyal po yin no/ /rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
102b1('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig
102b2('dul ba): tu 'khod do/ /kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/
102b3('dul ba): kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/ /kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe tshe
102b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas
102b5('dul ba): 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyod dam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa spyod snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
102b6('dul ba): kyis ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ /tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmas pa/ lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir
102b7('dul ba): ci mthong na/ /me spangs nas ni brtul zhugs 'di dag spyod/ /khyod kyis ci ltar me yi mchod spangs pa/ /don de 'od srung nga la smra bar gyis/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa/ 'di ni
103a1('dul ba): kha cig zas skom de bzhin ro/ /'dod pa dag dang bud med kho na smra/ /de dag thabs kyis dri mar rab mthong ste/ /des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs
103a2('dul ba): min/ /khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang / /de bzhin ro la yid ni mi dga' na/ /lha mi 'jig rten la ci khyod kyi yid/ /dga' ba yin nam 'od srung dri yi smros/ /phung po ma mchis
103a3('dul ba): zhi ba ci ma mchis/ /'dod sred ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri'i go 'phang mchog mthong ste/ /des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs min/ /go
103a4('dul ba): 'phang mi nyams mchog ni ma mthong bas/ /mchod sbyin pa brtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis/ /grol snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te/ /dmus long gyur nas skye shi rjes bzhin
103a5('dul ba): 'thom/ /skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad pa/ /go 'phang 'dus ma byas de gzod mthong na/ /thub pa go'u ta ma rnam par 'dren khyod ni/ /skye bo phal chen don brtson
103a6('dul ba): bden la bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis rtogs pa legs rtogs te/ /khyod kyis nyes par bsams ma yin/ /rab tu phye ba'i chos rnams la/ /
103a7('dul ba): gtso bo gang yin de blangs so/ /'od srung 'khor skyo ba skyed cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/
103b1('dul ba): rang gi stan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa
103b2('dul ba): dang / nyal bar byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gi lus las 'od zer rnam
103b3('dul ba): ba sna tshogs 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/
103b4('dul ba): lus kyi smad nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ /lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed
103b5('dul ba): pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi
103b6('dul ba): bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su
103b7('dul ba): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/ /bcom
104a1('dul ba): ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /ston pa lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/ /nyan thos lags so/ /'od srung de de bzhin
104a2('dul ba): no| |de de bzhin te/ 'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/ /khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/ /'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/ /khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/ /'od srung khyod rang gi
104a3('dul ba): stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas ma ga
104a4('dul ba): d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po ni lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la mi spyod kyi/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nyid dge
104a5('dul ba): sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod do snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzugs la
104a6('dul ba): skye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa yang yod de/ de'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye
104a7('dul ba): ba yang yod/ 'jig pa yang yod de/ de'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus/ gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/
104b1('dul ba): gzugs de yongs su shes so/ /rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ rnam par shes
104b2('dul ba): pa de yongs su shes so/ /rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na/ gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par
104b3('dul ba): zhen par mi byed do/ /rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su shes na bdag gam/ bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag
104b4('dul ba): par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam/ bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen
104b5('dul ba): par mi byed na/ tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /zhes smra'o/ /rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
104b6('dul ba): pa la bdag gam/ bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed na/ tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /zhes
104b7('dul ba): smra'o/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ma
105a1('dul ba): yin na/ 'o na bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po'am/ gso ba po'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu'am/ byed
105a2('dul ba): pa po'am/ byed du 'jug pa po'am/ shes pa po'am/ kun nas shes pa po'am/ slong pa po'am/ kun nas slong ba po'am/ smra ba po'am/ tshor ba po'am/ kun nas tshor ba po
105a3('dul ba): gang yin pa nam yang ma byung / 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / da lta yang yod pa ma yin na/ gang gis de dang der dge ba dang / sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor
105a4('dul ba): nyams su myong zhing / gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis/ ma ga d+ha'i bram
105a5('dul ba): ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas btags pa'i rjes
105a6('dul ba): su lhung ba yin te/ 'di la bdag ce'am bdag gi med kyi/ dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhig 'gag pa na yang sdug bsngal 'gag go /skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing
105a7('dul ba): 'gag pa na 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ rgyu dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug go /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi rgyud
105b1('dul ba): nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi
105b2('dul ba): 'pho dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / dman pa dang / gya nom pa dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang gzigs so/ /las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro
105b3('dul ba): ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ sems cad 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams
105b4('dul ba): la skur ba 'debs pa dang / log par lta ba yin te/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos blang ba'i rgyus rgyu de dang / rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
105b5('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams la skur
105b6('dul ba): pa mi 'debs pa dang / yang dag par lta ba yin te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang / chos blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des/ lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams
105b7('dul ba): su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mkhyen to/ /dge slong dag /ngas de ltar mkhyen cing de ltar gzigs pas/ nga 'di skad ces bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po'am
106a1('dul ba): gso ba po'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu'am/ byed pa po'am/ byed du 'jug pa po'am/ shes pa po'am/ kun nas shes pa po'am/
106a2('dul ba): slong ba po'am/ kun nas slong ba po'am/ smra ba po'am/ tshor ba po'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa ni nam yang ma byung / 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / da ltar yang yod pa ma yin/
106a3('dul ba): pas gang gis de dang der dge ba dang / sdig pa'i las byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te/ phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams
106a4('dul ba): sbyor ba de chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no/ /zhes mi gsung ngo / /de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di yod/ 'di skyes
106a5('dul ba): pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi
106a6('dul ba): rkyen gyis skye mched drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid
106a7('dul ba): pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi
106b1('dul ba): phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'di med pas 'di med la/ 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du
106b2('dul ba): byed 'gag / 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /
106b3('dul ba): skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags
106b4('dul ba): pas srid pa 'gag / srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
106b5('dul ba): pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi
106b6('dul ba): ba'o/ /rgyu kun 'byung gis sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal 'gags te/ rgyun bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med par 'gags pa 'di nyid
106b7('dul ba): ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /dge slong dag de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gags pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba/ de ni bsil bar
107a1('dul ba): gyur pa/ de ni nub pa ste/ dge slong dag zhi ba'i gnas 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ phung po thams cad spangs pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/
107a2('dul ba): 'gags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji
107a3('dul ba): snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gam/ mi rtag /btsun pa 'di mi rtag lags so/ /mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal pa yin nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug
107a4('dul ba): bsngal lags so/ /mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no/ /bdag ni 'di yin no/ /
107a5('dul ba): 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
107a6('dul ba): shes pa rtag gam/ mi rtag btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so/ /mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so/ /mi rtag pa
107a7('dul ba): sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no/ /bdag ni 'di yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag
107b1('dul ba): tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung / 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/
107b2('dul ba): nang gi'am/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa'am/ phra ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ gya nom pa'am/ gang dag thag ring ba'am/ gang dag thag nye bar yang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma
107b3('dul ba): yin no/ /bdag ni 'di ma yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/
107b4('dul ba): khyod kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi'am/ phyi'i 'am/
107b5('dul ba): rags pa'am/ phra ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ gya nom pa'am/ gang dag thag ring ba'am/ gang dag thag nye bar yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la ni bdag ma yin no/ /bdag
107b6('dul ba): ni 'di ma yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no/ /zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos
107b7('dul ba): thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni gzugs la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar
108a1('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /yid byung na 'dod chags dang bral lo/ /'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do//
108a2('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ ma
108a3('dul ba): ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang / lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
108a4('dul ba): bral ba skyes so/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting sleb pa dang / som nyi las
108a5('dul ba): rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs
108a6('dul ba): te| bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni
108a7('dul ba): 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du
108b1('dul ba): gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge
108b2('dul ba): 'dun du bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzim cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na/ bcom
108b3('dul ba): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
108b4('dul ba): po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
108b5('dul ba): snga nas song ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can
108b6('dul ba): snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
108b7('dul ba): dge slong dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i
109a1('dul ba): l as dag byas shing bsags pa ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar
109a2('dul ba): 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung
109a3('dul ba): gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur
109a4('dul ba): te| las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
109a5('dul ba): ba na/ 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
109a6('dul ba): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtsibs kyi lte ba zhes bya ba byung nas/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad de/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
109a7('dul ba): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas sa phyogs dben zhing yangs ba zhig tu mchod rten chen po brtsigs
109b1('dul ba): so| |de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba khrom gyi ru ba bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang / steng gi nam mkha' las yul rgyu ba na/ mchod rten de dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas
109b2('dul ba): la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i 'khor lo rin po che thogs par byas so/ /rgyal po kri kris bsams pa/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che 'di thogs pa las na/ bdag gi bsod
109b3('dul ba): nams zad par ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /de la lha rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bsod nams ma zad mod kyi/ phyogs 'di na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs
109b4('dul ba): kyi lte ba'i mchod rten bzhugs pas/ des na 'khor lo rin po che 'di de'i steng du mi 'gro zhing thogs par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po kri kris khrom gyi ru ba bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig
109b5('dul ba): ba bas na ji tsam na mchod rten gyi dor ma byas pa de mthong nas/ 'khor dang bcas pa des byi dor byas te/ dri dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / rol mo rnams kyis mchod
109b6('dul ba): pa byas nas 'khor dang bcas pas drung du btud de smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis yon tan 'di lta
109b7('dul ba): bu dag 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces btab bo/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'khor los
110a1('dul ba): sgyur ba'i rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te/ 'khor
110a2('dul ba): dang bcas pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte ba'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ 'dis bskal pa bye ba brgya
110a3('dul ba): stong phrag mang por lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba khyad par du 'phags pa nyams su myong bar gyur to/ /'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni
110a4('dul ba): nga'i spyan sngar 'khor dang bcas pa bden pa mthong bar byas so/ /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pas ni/
110a5('dul ba): nga nyid dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte bar lhan cig mnyam pas mnyam ste/ stobs mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / brtson 'grus mnyam pa dang / thob
110a6('dul ba): pa mnyam pa yin te/ 'dis ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi/ mi mnyes par ma byas pa yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa
110a7('dul ba): ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni dkar ba yin/ 'dres ma rnams kyi ni 'dres ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /
110b1('dul ba): 'dres ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba la btsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams
110b2('dul ba): cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul bar gyur lags/
110b3('dul ba): chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dag ni tshegs chung dus btul bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs
110b4('dul ba): su sgyur ba zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/
110b5('dul ba): 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
110b6('dul ba): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba byung nas wA ra NA si'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu brten te/ drang srong smra ba'i ri
110b7('dul ba): dwags kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
111a1('dul ba): 'das so/ /de'i sku gdung rgyal po kri kris spos kyi shing thams cad spungs te/ spungs pas bsregs nas me'o mas bsad de/ sku gdung de dag ni rin po
111a2('dul ba): che sna bzhi las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du blugs nas/ sa phyogs dben zhing yangs par sku gdung gi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad gcig la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa zhig brtsig tu bcug go /de'i tshe de'i
111a3('dul ba): dus na wA ra NA si na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig
111a4('dul ba): gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
111a5('dul ba): mgur spyod par byed pa na rim gyis khye'u gsum btsas so/ /ci tsam na khyim bdag de nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu'i sman
111a6('dul ba): rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur nas de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas de bu rnams kyis ras sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang dkar pos
111a7('dul ba): khyogs brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregs so/ /de nas pha la pha'i bya ba byas nas mya ngan sangs te/ de nas nor so so bgo bar gros bya bar brtsams nas/ phu bo shos kyis smras
111b1('dul ba): pa| nor bgo'o/ /nu bo spun gnyis ma dad do/ /des gal gyis gcus pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar na re zhig 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags blangs la phyis bgo
111b2('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /des smras pa ci dag bya/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'di la mchod do/ /de dad pa chung ba zhig pas des bka' 'khor du khas
111b3('dul ba): blangs so/ /de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la mchod nas smon lam gdab par brtsams te/ gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba
111b4('dul ba): 'dis bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de
111b5('dul ba): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i bstan pa la bdag cag rab tu byung nas khyad
111b6('dul ba): par thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/ /de gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa/ phu bo des thos nas drung du btud de/ smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag ni dad pa chung la dmu rgod yin
111b7('dul ba): pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul nas rab tu phyung ste/ rab tu byung nas kyang khyad par rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge
112a1('dul ba): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ phu bo shos dmu rgod dad pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni/ lteng rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid yin no/ /nu bo gnyis po gang dag yin pa de
112a2('dul ba): dag ni chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung 'di dag nyid yin no/ /smon lam gyi dbang des na lteng rgyas 'od srung cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul ba yin no/ /chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya
112a3('dul ba): 'od srung ni tshegs chung dus btul ba yin no/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa de la/ kun dga'i ra ba me tog
112a4('dul ba): dang | 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags par gyur to/ /ji tsam na gzugs can snying po phyi rol tu byung bas skyed mos tshal de mthong ba dang /
112a5('dul ba): de yang lhag par chags par gyur nas smras pa/ khyim bdag skyed mos tshal 'di nga la byin cig /des ma byin no/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du yang smras na yang ma byin nas/ yang smras
112a6('dul ba): pa| rin sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ gzhon nu nyes na kho bo yul nas spyugs kyang bla'i skyed mos tshal ni mi 'bul lo/ /gzhon nu gzugs can snying pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis
112a7('dul ba): smras pa dran par byos shig / nam nga rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe nga nyid kyis bkur ro/ /des smras pa/ nam khyod rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo yang rgyal po'i khab nas 'gro'o/ /gzhon nu
112b1('dul ba): gzugs can snying pos 'jal to zhes byas nas song ngo / /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po pad+ma chen po shi nas/ gzhon nu gzugs can snying po rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang / des skyed mos
112b2('dul ba): tshal de mthus phrogs so/ /khyim bdag de snying na zhing skyed mos tshal de la lhag par chags pas shi nas de nyid kyi sbrul gdug pa zhig tu skyes te/ de rgyal po la rgyun du glags tshol ba lhur len cing
112b3('dul ba): gnas so/ /ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po so ga'i dus lab ste/ me tog gi shing rnam kha 'bus pa na btsun mo dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal der zhugs nas/ de de na skyes pa med par rol
112b4('dul ba): mos btsun mo'i bud med dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid log go / bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas kun tu 'khyam du dong ngo / /bud med gcig
112b5('dul ba): gi ral gri bskur te/ rgyal po srung du bcug go /de nas sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i drung na sgra mi grag par rig nas rgyal po la gzung ba'i phyir tshang nas byung ste chas so/ /rgyal po'i bsod nams
112b6('dul ba): kyi mthus bya ka lan da ka zhes bya ba de rnams kyis sbrul gdug pa de kun nas bskor nas tsi tsi'i sgra phyung ngo / /bud med ral gri thogs pas thos nas/ sdangs te sgra chen po phyung nas ral
112b7('dul ba): gris bsad do/ /de nas rgyal po yang sdangs te sad nas smras pa/ 'di ci byung / bud med des smras pa/ lha sbrul gdug pa 'di lha la gzung ba'i phyir chas pa na/ bya ka lan da ka rnams
113a1('dul ba): kyis tsi tsi'i sgra phyung nas bdag gis bkum lags so/ /rgyal po'i gnas skabs de gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / khrom gyi ru ba dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas
113a2('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis thos nas/ skyed mos tshal de'i phyi nang du ku co'i sgra chen pos gang bar gyur te/ rgyal po de skye dgu la byams pa zhig pas/ phyir zhing btsun mo skye bo'i
113a3('dul ba): tshogs dang bcas te mig mchi mas gang zhing 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la srog skyob pa de la mchog ci
113a4('dul ba): sbyin/ skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal srid kyi phyed do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag bya ka lan da ka rnams kyis nga'i srog byin pas rgyal srid phyed 'di dag la byin
113a5('dul ba): no| |blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bya 'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba lags pas/ rgyal srid phyed kyi 'di dag la ci bgyi/ 'di dag 'od ma'i tshal gang du gnas pa der
113a6('dul ba): 'di dag gi gnas bca'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ skyed mos tshal de 'od ma'i tshal gyis yongs su bskor te/ blon po rnams kyis de rnams kyi gnas 'od ma'i
113a7('dul ba): tshal gyi nye 'khor du bcas pas/ de 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zhang po kun tu 'tsho rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung nas/
113b1('dul ba): des skyed mos tshal de de'i gnas kyi phyir byin no/ /ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing zhig gi drung na bzhugs so/ /
113b2('dul ba): ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing zhig gi drung du bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos
113b3('dul ba): nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
113b4('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
113b5('dul ba): yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang
113b6('dul ba): ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' ba mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
113b7('dul ba): po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
114a1('dul ba): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/
114a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan
114a3('dul ba): 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
114a4('dul ba): can snying pos/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas
114a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyi dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham
114a6('dul ba): thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yong su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
114a7('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
114b1('dul ba): gzugs can snying pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim
114b2('dul ba): par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/
114b3('dul ba): lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'dir bcom ldan 'das ci bde bar bzhugs shig ces bcom ldan 'das la
114b4('dul ba): skyed mos tshal de phul lo/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde rnams kyi nang du/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so//
114b5('dul ba): zhes gdags par byas so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des bcom ldan
114b6('dul ba): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rang gi khyim du spyan drangs so/ /yang de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de khyim bdag
114b7('dul ba): de'i khyim du nub mo brang btab bo/ /de nas khyim bdag de de nyid kyi mtshan mo langs te/ nang mi rnams la bsgo ba/ nang rje dag longs shig /bzhin bzang dag longs shig /shing rnams
115a1('dul ba): gshogs shig / me dag bus shig /'bras chan tshos shig /sran tshod tshos shig /bca' ba dag bzang du gyis shig /bkad sa'i zhal ta dag gyis shig /de
115a2('dul ba): nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ ci khyim bdag 'di bag ma len tam/ bag ma gtong ngam/ yul mi'am/ tshong pa'am/ tshogs sam/ 'khor tam/ 'dis ma
115a3('dul ba): ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs sam snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag khyod ci bag ma
115a4('dul ba): len tam/ bag ma gtong ngam/ yul mi'am/ tshong pa'am/ tshogs sam/ 'khor tam/ khyod kyi ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan
115a5('dul ba): drangs sam/ khyim bdag kho bo bag ma len tam/ bag ma gtong ba yang ma yin/ yul mi ma yin/ tshong pa ma yin/ tshogs pa ma yin/ 'khor ma yin/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo
115a6('dul ba): sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /khyim
115a7('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos pa dang / ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byas nas/ de spu zing zhes byed pas khyim bdag
115b1('dul ba): de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas
115b2('dul ba): dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de ni sangs rgyas
