115b3('dul ba): zhes bya'o/ /khyim bdag dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdag rgyal rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas
115b4('dul ba): khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu dag skra
115b5('dul ba): dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod de/ khyim bdag de ni
115b6('dul ba): dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin te/ sang kho bo'i khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang na bzhugs/
115b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis bltar rung ngam/ khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod re zhig sdod cig dang /
116a1('dul ba): gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid du gshegs dang / sang khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon
116a2('dul ba): med zas sbyin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas nyal lo/ /de nam ma langs par nam langs pa'i 'du shes kyis lho sgo gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe lho sgo thun gnyis la sgo
116a3('dul ba): phye nas 'jog ste thun dang po la ni pho nya glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams mi thogs pa bya ba'i phyir phye ste 'jog go / thun tha ma la ni pho nya 'gro bar chas pa rnams mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir phye
116a4('dul ba): ste 'jog go / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar lho sgo phye ste 'dug pas gdon mi za bar nam langs so snyam du rig nas/ snang ba de nyid du grong khyer
116a5('dul ba): nas byung ba dang / de byung ma thag tu snang ba gang yin pa de med nas slar mun nag por gyur to/ /de 'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bdag mi'am/
116a6('dul ba): mi ma yin pa'am/ g.yon can 'ga' zhig gis gtses par mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams nas slar ldog par 'dod pa dang / de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des/
116a7('dul ba): ci tsam lho phyogs kyi sgo nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod kyi bar thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim
116b1('dul ba): bdag spyan sngar song zhig / slar ma ldog cig /khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rta brgya dang ni gser rgyan brgya/ dre'u yi shing rta
116b2('dul ba): brgya dang ni/ /sna tshogs nor gyis spud pa yi/ /rta rgod ma yi shing rta brgya/ /gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig /slar ma ldog
116b3('dul ba): cig / khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gangs can ri yi glang chen brgya/ /gser dang nor bus brgyan byas la/ /lus che gshol
116b4('dul ba): mda'i mche bar ldan/ /ma tang ga skyes stong po che/ /gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig /slar ma ldog cig /khyod spyan sngar song
116b5('dul ba): na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tho gar yul gyi bu mo brgya/ /nor bu'i rna cha gdub kor thogs/ /gser gyi dpung rgyan thogs pa yi/ /mgrin pa rgyan gyis
116b6('dul ba): legs brgyan pa/ /gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ /slar ma ldog cig /khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni
116b7('dul ba): ma yin no/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhin bzang khyod su zhig /khyim bdag kho bo ni khyod nyid kyi grogs po snying pa bram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i
117a1('dul ba): phung po yin te/ kho bos dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis la sems dad pa bskyed nas shi ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su
117a2('dul ba): skyes te/ lho sgo 'di nyid na gnyug mar gnas so/ /de'i phyir khyod la kho bos 'di skad ces khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig slar ma ldog cig /khyod spyan sngar song nas legs par 'gyur gyi slar
117a3('dul ba): log na ni ma yin no/ /zhes smra'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bshad
117a4('dul ba): pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das de la blta bar lha yang brtson par byed do snyam du bsams nas/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba dang / de'i tshe
117a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag cing lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'ongs pa la gzhes so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med
117a6('dul ba): zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis yang dag par dgyes par 'gyur bas yang dag par dgyes par byed
117a7('dul ba): de/ bcom ldan 'das cig bde bar mnal tam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos la/ /zag med rab tu rnam grol
117b1('dul ba): ba/ /mya ngan yongs 'das bram ze ni/ /thams cad du ni bde bar mnal/ /'dir ni re ba kun bcas nas/ /thugs kyi rims nad rnams bsal cing / /zhi ba thob pa'i thugs kyis na/ /nye
117b2('dul ba): bar zhi ba bde bar mnal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khrid nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ gdan bshams ba nyid la bzhugs pa dang / khyim bdag
117b3('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon
117b4('dul ba): med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ /yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs
117b5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa
117b6('dul ba): rnams la mnog chung ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan yon gyi rjes su bsngags pa dang /
117b7('dul ba): rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems
118a1('dul ba): dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal pa dang ldan pa'i yang dag pa phul gyi chos bshad pa kun shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom
118a2('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam rgyas par
118a3('dul ba): rab tu bstan to/ /dper na gos gtsang ma nag gnog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin btub pa de bzhin du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan de
118a4('dul ba): nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas
118a5('dul ba): sbyin gyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
118a6('dul ba): gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs
118a7('dul ba): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge
118b1('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas
118b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag khyod kyi ming ci/ btsun pa bdag gi ming bzang sbyin lags mod kyi/ bdag mgon ma mchis
118b3('dul ba): pa rnams la 'tshal ma stsol pas/ des na bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar skye bos 'tshal to/ /khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/ btsun pa yul bra tsi na zhes bgyi ba na ko sa la rnams
118b4('dul ba): kyi grong khyer mnyan yod ces bgyis pa mchis te/ de na bdag mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs shig dang / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig
118b5('dul ba): la/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi lags so/ /khyim bdag
118b6('dul ba): mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ btsun pa ma mchis lags so/ /khyim bdag gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas par sems
118b7('dul ba): so/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig dang / bdag gis ci nas kyang mnyan yod du dge slong rnams mchis pa dang / gzhan du mchi ba dang / mchi bar sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag
119a1('dul ba): khang brtsigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas
119a2('dul ba): sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis kyi la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas
119a3('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba dang bsgrub pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad byas shing bsgrub nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
119a4('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
119a5('dul ba): ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong gcig stsal du gsol/ de dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang brtsigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
119a6('dul ba): dge slong su zhig gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur snyam na/ dge slong shA ri'i bus 'dul
119a7('dul ba): bar gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas
119b1('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
119b2('dul ba): bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs
119b3('dul ba): te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya bas byas nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te/ gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab
119b4('dul ba): nas/ de lhung bzed dang / chos gos blangs te/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam rgyags mang po khyer nas/ nub mo nub mo zhing
119b5('dul ba): mnyan yod du song ste phyin nas/ de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal nas nags tshal
119b6('dul ba): du/ 'chags nas 'chag sar dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras so/ /mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la/ ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang /
119b7('dul ba): mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sprul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs gang na yod pa der/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
120a1('dul ba): kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsigs na/ sa phyogs de gang na yod snyam pa las/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni
120a2('dul ba): mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring la ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par yang lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang / mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang /
120a3('dul ba): rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ de
120a4('dul ba): rang gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba bdag la stsol cig /der bdag
120a5('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/ /des smras pa/ khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ni ma yin te/ skyed mos tshal yin mod kyi/ de nga'i yin
120a6('dul ba): no/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba stsol cig /bdag gis
120a7('dul ba): der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/ /khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gser bye ba bshibs kyang mi gtong ngo // //'dul ba gzhi/ /bam po
120b1('dul ba): dgu bcu pa/ yang khyim bdag mgon med zas byin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bkum lags kyis/ dbyig dang gser bzhes
120b2('dul ba): shig / kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lags so/ /rin thang sus bcad/ khyod kyis rin thang bkum mod/ de gnyis rin thang bcad do/ /rin thang ma bcad do zhes rtsod par gyur nas/ zhal
120b3('dul ba): che gcod pa'i mi gang na ba der dong ba dang / bar skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang
120b4('dul ba): brtsig par brtson gyis/ de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas de nas zhal che gcod pa'i mir bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ dgos pa'i phyir 'dus so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /
120b5('dul ba): gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i drung du song nas de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal che ba gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams la don de
120b6('dul ba): rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba ni rin thang bcad zin gyis gser long zhig /kun dga' ba ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yin no/ /de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
120b7('dul ba): de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta dang / rgya dang / gzeb dang / rnga mo dang / glang dang / bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad
121a1('dul ba): gshib par brtsams pa dang / sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing
121a2('dul ba): yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ngu yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin
121a3('dul ba): pa de gang yin snyam pa dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni gdon mi za bar ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po chen po 'di snyed du
121a4('dul ba): yongs su btang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag gal te khyod 'gyod pa skyes na gser slar long zhig /kun
121a5('dul ba): dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyi yin no/ /gzhon nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te 'on kyang don 'di sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug pa ni/ bdag gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di
121a6('dul ba): bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo/ de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma
121a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la da ltar khyim bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po 'di
121b1('dul ba): snyed yongs su gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la sbyin cig /der kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi
121b2('dul ba): phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin nas/ der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir
121b3('dul ba): sgo khang brtsig tu bcug go / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsams pa dang / mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas slong
121b4('dul ba): ba'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsigs shig /
121b5('dul ba): ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer bgos te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i ni rgyal po'i khab yin no/ /kho bo cag gi ni mnyan yod yin no/ /des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos
121b6('dul ba): kyi/ bdag gi nor ma bgos pas gang la mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyi phung po brtsig go /de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang / der yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par
121b7('dul ba): byas pa dang / mu stegs spyi brtol can mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod dga' mgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog gcig 'ongs nas/ gal
122a1('dul ba): te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig /des smras pa/ rung gi re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go /de nas
122a2('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang ba gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
122a3('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces khyim bdag
122a4('dul ba): khyod dga' mgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchi
122a5('dul ba): na| de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med ces bsams pa las yod par mthong ngo / /
122a6('dul ba): su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na bdag kho na la'o/ /yang bsams pa/ ji 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan yang tshig
122a7('dul ba): gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las yod par mthong ngo / /dus ji srid kyi tshogs par 'gyur snyam na/ zhag bdun lon nas so/ /bsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on
122b1('dul ba): kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/ mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mu stegs can rnams la 'di
122b2('dul ba): skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag /'phags pa shA ri'i bu na re de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro/ /de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di la rgyu gnyis yod par
122b3('dul ba): 'gyur te/ yang na ni de 'bros 'dod do/ /yang na ni de phyogs tshol lo/ /de ma yin na dus der gdab ci dgos/ bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal lo zhes de rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/ de
122b4('dul ba): rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang / kun tu rgyu mig dmar mthong nas/ de la de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta
122b5('dul ba): ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol gyis/ khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs kyis shig /dus ji tsam zhig na/ 'di nas zhag bdun gyi nyin
122b6('dul ba): par ro/ /rung gis de bzhin du bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus par gyur ba de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig /mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang / sems khral skyes nas/ nyin re zhing phyogs
122b7('dul ba): tshol ba dang / nyi ma bgrang bar byed do/ /ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du bcug go /tshe dang ldan
123a1('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng ge'i khri bshams so/ /yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i
123a2('dul ba): tshogs dang / de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mtshar skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
123a3('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar te/ rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas te/ 'dzum pa sngon du
123a4('dul ba): btang nas spyod lam zhi bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go / 'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng bar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
123a5('dul ba): bus mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci re zhig byed dam/ 'on te 'jig /de rnams kyi smras pa/ kho bo cag gis byas/ khyod kyis shig cig /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
123a6('dul ba): bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis byas na 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas kyang 'jig par mi nus na/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas/ kun tu rgyu mig
123a7('dul ba): dmar la 'di skad ces smras so/ khyod kyis byos shig/ ngas gzhig go /de mig 'phrul byang ba yin pas/ des shing sa ha ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
123b1('dul ba): shA ri'i bus rlung dang char drag po phab ste/ des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas phan tshun du rnam par gtor te/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to/ /de nas des pad+ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang /
123b2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas/ des kun tu rnal nas ming gi lhag ma tsam zhig bzhag go /des sprul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
123b3('dul ba): nam mkha' lding zhig sprul te/ des de blangs so/ /des ro langs shig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pas btab pa las nyes par spyad pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid
123b4('dul ba): la gsod par byed pas des de nyid bsnyags pa dang / de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs shing spu zing zhes byed nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ 'phags pa shA
123b5('dul ba): ri'i bu skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang / ro langs de zhi bar gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
123b6('dul ba): de la chos bshad de de dad pa skyes nas smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
123b7('dul ba): gnang na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas gdams ngag byin te des brtson
124a1('dul ba): pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum
124a2('dul ba): gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i
124a3('dul ba): sbubs dral cing rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye
124a4('dul ba): ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas/ tshe dang
124a5('dul ba): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te/ smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni/ smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po tshar bcad do snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar
124a6('dul ba): gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so so yang dag par
124a7('dul ba): rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas so/ /de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/
124b1('dul ba): kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs/ kha cig
124b2('dul ba): gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas
124b3('dul ba): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba/ chos la 'bab pa/ dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/ /mu
124b4('dul ba): stegs can rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag gis 'di shags kyis tshar bcad par mi nus kyis thabs shig bsham par byas la/ de nas glags rnyed nas 'di bgags te gsod
124b5('dul ba): par bya'o snyam nas thams cad 'dus te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du dong ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad ni bcad pas/ de bas
124b6('dul ba): snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyis gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/ /kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo / /khyim bdag mgon med
124b7('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
125a1('dul ba): 'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid nas/ khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad pas de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod
125a2('dul ba): kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/ /kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bsam pa la zhugs te/ ci 'di
125a3('dul ba): dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med snyam na des yod par mthong ngo / /su zhig la rag lus snyam na/ bdag kho na yin snyam nas/ des bsams te smras pa/ khyim bdag
125a4('dul ba): de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig / de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla mi'i las byed par brtsams pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcags thogs kyi mig gtum po zhig
125a5('dul ba): sprul nas/ des de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas/ de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na/ 'chag cing
125a6('dul ba): 'dug pa dang / de rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ dben pa na 'dug pas/ 'di gsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong ste bskor
125a7('dul ba): nas 'dug go / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di rnams bsam pa ci 'dra bas bdag gi drung du 'ongs snyam na/ ci tsam na gsad pa'i sems kyis yin par shes nas/ des lcags thogs
125b1('dul ba): sprul pa de sbad nas/ des de rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re zhig
125b2('dul ba): song la ngal sor chug cig / de rnams kyis bsags pa/ 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni 'di gsad par bsams na/ 'di ni bdag cag la byams par sems so
125b3('dul ba): snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so
125b4('dul ba): s or rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te de thos nas de rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
125b5('dul ba): bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi
125b6('dul ba): dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ de rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams
125b7('dul ba): ngag byin te/ de rnams kyis brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang brtsal bar byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa
126a1('dul ba): dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon
126a2('dul ba): sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan
126a3('dul ba): pa| tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing / rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la
126a4('dul ba): chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur
126a5('dul ba): to| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung / mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan
126a6('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsams so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
126a7('dul ba): nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim bdag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de
126b1('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang
126b2('dul ba): gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang
126b3('dul ba): lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems
126b4('dul ba): mngon par dad par byas te/ dad pa de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so/ /de nas khyim
126b5('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu rtsig tu bcug ste/ de gtsug lag khang chen po
126b6('dul ba): bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu brtsigs nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di
126b7('dul ba): skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na/ shul sa ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/ khyim bdag dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tsam mo/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i
127a1('dul ba): rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyin gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du 'gro'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas
127a2('dul ba): sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug / sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug /dus tshod gsol ba'i mi
127a3('dul ba): dag bkod/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor dag nye bar bkod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug /
127a4('dul ba): dus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go /de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje tshur spyon/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la/ son pa dang kho
127a5('dul ba): bo'i tshig gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ 'tsho'am bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas
127a6('dul ba): sam/ zhes zhus la 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na
127a7('dul ba): bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes kyang gsol cig /jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi
127b1('dul ba): des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das
127b2('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di
127b3('dul ba): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar
127b4('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o/ /kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs
127b5('dul ba): su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzim cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman
127b6('dul ba): gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do zhes mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig
127b7('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba
128a1('dul ba): 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang
128a2('dul ba): bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che'i mchog glang po che phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
128a3('dul ba): lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i
128a4('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor lo sgyur ba bu stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/
128a5('dul ba): yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu
128a6('dul ba): gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thags bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi
128a7('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul
128b1('dul ba): ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i
128b2('dul ba): 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs
128b3('dul ba): rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / lha brgya stong phrag du
128b4('dul ba): mas zham 'bring byas nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong
128b5('dul ba): khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu
128b6('dul ba): ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na/
128b7('dul ba): dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te/ snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /bar snang la yang lha'i rnga rdung
129a1('dul ba): zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku ma ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i
129a2('dul ba): phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gur gum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog mnad ra ba rnams 'thor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro/ /
129a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to/ /dma' ba rnams
129a4('dul ba): ni mthon por gyur to/ /mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to/ /glang po che yang skad 'byin/ rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to/ /khyim na yod pa'i rol mo cha byad
129a5('dul ba): sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to/ /long ba rnams kyis ni mig gis mthong ngo / /'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos so/ /lkugs pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to/ /dbang
129a6('dul ba): po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po rnams yongs su tshang bar gyur to/ /chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to/ /phan tshun
129a7('dul ba): 'khon byung ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to/ /btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa thams cad las thar ro/ /nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed
129b1('dul ba): par gyur to/ /de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du
129b2('dul ba): gshegs so/ /gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen
129b3('dul ba): gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun sbreng bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/ bdag
129b4('dul ba): gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do/ /
129b5('dul ba): 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig /des phyogs
129b6('dul ba): gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad
129b7('dul ba): pa na/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi
130a1('dul ba): sems mkhyen nas dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no/ /zhes der ming thog mar smos pa mdzad do/ /gzhon
130a2('dul ba): nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis deng bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas/ shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan
130a3('dul ba): 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go / de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang / mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
130a4('dul ba): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan
130a5('dul ba): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ shes ldan go'u ta ma de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
130a6('dul ba): par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag
130a7('dul ba): par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
130b1('dul ba): ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma bdag gis shes ldan go'u ta ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos
130b2('dul ba): lags na/ go'u ta ma gang dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag cig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs pa ma lags sam/ thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/ shes ldan go'u ta mas gsungs
130b3('dul ba): bzhin smra ba lags sam/ chos smra ba lags sam/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/ ci ga de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun par rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa mchis
130b4('dul ba): na| smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden de nga la skur pa 'debs pa ma yin/ thal bar smra ba ma
130b5('dul ba): yin/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/ chos smra ba yin/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa 'ongs na
130b6('dul ba): smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /shes ldan go'u ta ma
130b7('dul ba): de skad gsung mod kyi/ shes ldan dag go'u ta ma la bdag yid mi ches lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kye go'u ta ma re zhig rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste/
131a1('dul ba): 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog
131a2('dul ba): can dang / gcer bu gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyi mi 'che lags na/
131a3('dul ba): shes ldan go'u ta ma 'khrungs nas ring po ma lags pa/ gsar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu
131a4('dul ba): la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po sprul gzhon nu
131a5('dul ba): la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po me chung du la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ chung du la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dge
131a6('dul ba): slong gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang / de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra
131a7('dul ba): bcom par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces/ /bka' stsal nas ni bder gshegs kyis/ /de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ /ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs/ /
131b1('dul ba): rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang / /rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la/ /blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/ /khyad du mi bsad zil mi mnan/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis/ /rgyal
131b2('dul ba): srid dag ni thob gyur nas/ /chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod/ /de bas de la shin tu gdung / /de ltar rang gi srog srung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi bsad cing / /de
131b3('dul ba): la legs par bag kyang bya/ /gal te grong ngam dgon pa'ang rung / /gang du sbrul ni mthong gyur na/ /blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/ /de khyad mi gsad zil mi mnon/ /'di ltar sbrul ni
131b4('dul ba): rgyu ba na/ /rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la/ /glags rnyed nas ni gzhon nus kyang / /skyes pa bud med du ma zin/ /de ltas rang gi srog srung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi
131b5('dul ba): gsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /mang po sreg cing 'bar byed la/ /lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me/ /blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes/ /khyad du mi bsad zil mi mnan/ /me
131b6('dul ba): ni chung ngur gyur pa yang / /rkyen las chen por gyur pa yin/ /mes ni ring po mi thogs par/ /grong rdal dang ni grong khyer sreg /de ltas rang gi srog srung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de
131b7('dul ba): ni khyad du mi bsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i mes/ /nags tshal bsregs pa gang yin de/ /zhag 'das nas ni 'ga' zhig tu/ /'dab ma
132a1('dul ba): rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi/ /dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la/ /brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa/ /de la bu tsha yod min pas/ /bsgo skal spyod pa 'thob mi 'gyur
132a2('dul ba): ta la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin/ /ring por mi thogs rabs kyang 'chad/ /de bas rang gi srog srung zhing / /rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / /de la legs par
132a3('dul ba): bag kyang bya/ /rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang / /de bzhin brang 'gro me dang ni/ /dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la/ /blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya/ /de bas rang gi srog srung zhing / /
132a4('dul ba): rang gi don la lta bas ni/ /de la khyad du mi bsad cing / /de la legs par bag kyang bya/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
132a5('dul ba): dga' ste/ rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
132a6('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes pa bskyed
132a7('dul ba): du gsol/ khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo / /gnyis
132b1('dul ba): pa btang ba dang de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
132b2('dul ba): lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa/
132b3('dul ba): 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal btad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka'
132b4('dul ba): ba spyod pa de'i tshe/ kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho'i gan du 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dir bzhugs so zhes smra'o/ /da
132b5('dul ba): ni kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang 'phrin khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchi ste bka' bzhin 'tshal nas slar
132b6('dul ba): mchi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas
132b7('dul ba): gang yin pa de yod do/ /'char kas smras pa/ lha slar mchi lags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis 'phrin yig bris pa/ lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/ /khyod ni bdag gis cher
133a1('dul ba): bskrun te/ /nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/ /rgyal po ljon shing la bsdad na/ /da ni khyod kyi slob ma yi/ /yal ga lcug ma 'phel gyur pas/ /gzhan ni bde
133a2('dul ba): bas dga' bar gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal skal ba ldan/ /gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na/ /bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te/ /
133a3('dul ba): bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyad thob na/ /de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med/ /gang tshe thog ma bltams pa na/ /nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni/ /shin
133a4('dul ba): tu che thang phan gdags zhes/ /khyod kyi dam bca' mdzad nas ni/ /khyod kyis zhi gnas de rnyed na/ /bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la/ /thugs brtse rjes su gzung mdzod de/ /gshegs
133a5('dul ba): par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ /zhes spring pa'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
133a6('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa'i yi ge lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas
133a7('dul ba): bklags so/ /bklags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu gzhag pa dang / 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das
133b1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka 'dong ngo / /'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas/ de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud
133b2('dul ba): dang bdag gi mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgyal por ma chags shing / /sred 'gag
133b3('dul ba): bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing / /sred 'gag bkri ba
133b4('dul ba): yod pa ma yin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing / /'jig rten ma bcom cung
133b5('dul ba): zad yod min pas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing / /'jig rten ma bcom cung
133b6('dul ba): zad yod min pas/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/ /gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ /lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags te/ bcom
133b7('dul ba): ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang la rig par bya'o/ /'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no/ /'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin
134a1('dul ba): gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung zhig / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
134a2('dul ba): pa| 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon
134a3('dul ba): dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go /'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung
134a4('dul ba): lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung
134a5('dul ba): zhig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ kun tu spyod pa'i
134a6('dul ba): chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba dag go /btsun pa bka'
134a7('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
134b1('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
134b2('dul ba): 'char ka song la khyod de mod kho nar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgo na sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te nang du spyon cig ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o/ /
134b3('dul ba): zhugs nas gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na/ yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'am zhes
134b4('dul ba): 'dri na/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu
134b5('dul ba): gnas par mi byed dam zhes gleng na mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te gtsug lag
134b6('dul ba): khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o/ /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na/ byon no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /ji srid cig
134b7('dul ba): na byon zhes 'dri na zhag bdun lon na'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa song zhig /sa bdag rnams ni
135a1('dul ba): tshig gis te/ /lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyis/ /sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub/ /bcom ldan 'das
135a2('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzod
135a3('dul ba): pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag
135a4('dul ba): kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do/ /de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thong zhig /de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang
135a5('dul ba): gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung ngam/ des smras pa/ lha rab tu byung ngo / /khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smra ba yin nam/ 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das
135a6('dul ba): kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi/ bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo //
135a7('dul ba): rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de'i don du chu brtags pa gtsang ma dang / 'bras bu brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug
135b1('dul ba): go |tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang / dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yongs su longs spyad do/ /rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar
135b2('dul ba): skyes te smras pa/ 'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags
135b3('dul ba): so| |dper ji lta bu/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no/ /rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no/ /nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no/ /nam mkha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no/ /rgyal po
135b4('dul ba): zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal nas sa la 'gyel
135b5('dul ba): ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar byung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ byon no/ /dus ji srid cig na/ dgung bdun lon
135b6('dul ba): na'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis/ rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor gyis shig /'char kas
135b7('dul ba): smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o/ /rgyal po
136a1('dul ba): zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to/ /de nas rgyal
136a2('dul ba): pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu brtsig tu chug cig /lha
136a3('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran
136a4('dul ba): drug cu brtsig tu bcug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu song la /dge slong rnams la bcom ldan
136a5('dul ba): 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na/ khyed cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos long zhig /ces bsgo zhig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa
136a6('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na/ khyed
136a7('dul ba): cag las lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long zhig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor
136b1('dul ba): dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa /
136b2('dul ba): khyu mchog ba glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po che phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng+ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i
136b3('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa'
136b4('dul ba): bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan mgron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis
136b5('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri
136b6('dul ba): za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis
136b7('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu/ thags bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu /
137a1('dul ba): rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku
137a2('dul ba): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od
137a3('dul ba): can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge
137a4('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 'bab chu ro hi kar byon to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/ 'bab chu ro hi kar byon to/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas
137a5('dul ba): kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma rnams bsal nas tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin tu zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bshams/
137a6('dul ba): dar gyi chun 'phyangs mang po dpyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ka nas/ gang yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar
137a7('dul ba): gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go / de nas 'bab chu ro hi ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed/ kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed do/ /kha cig ni khrus byed do/ /
137b1('dul ba): ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes
137b2('dul ba): nas thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa lta'o snyam mo// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam
137b3('dul ba): po go gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na/ shAkya rgyal can rnams/ kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas
137b4('dul ba): dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas lhod po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te dus de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad
137b5('dul ba): pas bdud rtsi thob nas da zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi
137b6('dul ba): bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms
137b7('dul ba): par 'jug par mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
138a1('dul ba): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go /cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i
138a2('dul ba): stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/ /sku'i stod nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
138a3('dul ba): so| |shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus
138a4('dul ba): te| ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o/ /bcom
138a5('dul ba): ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi
138a6('dul ba): srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyis srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid
138a7('dul ba): tsam na bzhugs na ni/ dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnam lnga'i srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam
138b1('dul ba): na ni/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams
138b2('dul ba): gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams sa la'o/ /rgyal po
138b3('dul ba): zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char
138b4('dul ba): ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na/ de la gzhon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags
138b5('dul ba): srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/ /'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed de nyid don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags/ /'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga'
138b6('dul ba): bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ /dri med gsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang dag gzigs shig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la
138b7('dul ba): phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltams pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang / /'dzam
139a1('dul ba): bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/ /de nas shAkya dang / shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthong nas/
139a2('dul ba): de ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan
139a3('dul ba): dag da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltams pa na/ se chen po g.yos par gyur cing /
139a4('dul ba): 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di
139a5('dul ba): ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba de sems can gang dag
139a6('dul ba): gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/ shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang
139a7('dul ba): chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so/ /gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/ zhing las kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa
139b1('dul ba): rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan
139b2('dul ba): dang po nye bar bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/ shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i
139b3('dul ba): sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan
139b4('dul ba): gsum phyag byas so/ /de bas na 'di skad ces/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ /bltams pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang / /'dzam bu'i
139b5('dul ba): grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi
139b6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing snying dang mig mchi mas gang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu
139b7('dul ba): ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las/ /yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las/ /dgon pa'i 'jigs dang bcas rnams su/ /ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
140a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang du ni/ /khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba/ /'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcu/ /thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/ /rgyal pos gsol
140a2('dul ba): ba| ba so gser gyi rtsa ba can/ shin tu bde ba bting ba yi/ /khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las/ /gding ba la ni ji ltar mnal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam grol gnas
140a3('dul ba): mal ni/ /dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi /me tog bkram par chags med cing / /yongs su gdung ba rnams spangs mnal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni/ /gser
140a4('dul ba): dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ /rnyog pa can la dro ba yi/ /chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ma dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med/ /bsod nams
140a5('dul ba): 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /de la rig pa'i yon tan rmed bkrus nas/ /lus mi gsher ba pha rol rab tu rgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yi/ /
140a6('dul ba): tsan dan gyis ni sku bkrus shing / /ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa lags/ /de dang bral na mdzes ma lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin te/ /tshul
140a7('dul ba): khrims nyid ni byug pa yin/ /gser dang nor bu rna cha dag /rmongs bskyed nga la ci zhig bya/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na/ /glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa/ /tsher mar bcas
140b1('dul ba): pa'i sa gzhi la/ /zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang / /yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa yis/ /sa kun rnam par rgyu na yang //
140b2('dul ba): nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i/ /na bza' mnabs na mdzes pa las/ /ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa/ /ji ltar khyod kyi
140b3('dul ba): sku yis bzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes/ /nga yi bgo ba rnam sbyar te/ /de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams/ /nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas
140b4('dul ba): gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa nas/ /du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las/ /'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni/ /phal ba gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi/
140b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni/ /nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i/ /nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi/ /'jig rten kun la brtse
140b6('dul ba): phyir nga spyod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/ /rgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol na/ /rnyog pa can la dro ba yi/ /chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/ /bcom ldan
140b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na/ /bdag la btung ba thams cad ni/ /dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa/ /chos kyi ro mchog nga btung ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol
141a1('dul ba): pa| 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang / /khang bzang steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs/ /da lta gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa/ /blo bzang ji ltar
141a2('dul ba): bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin de/ dri ma bag chags bcas par ngas spangs pas/ nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas
141a3('dul ba): te| |nga la 'di na 'jigs pa cung zad med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba/ khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ong bar/ /khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na/ gcig pu khyod
141a4('dul ba): ni nags khrod gnas bsten par/ /thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u tam chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa/ /tshul khrims 'jug ngogs
141a5('dul ba): dam pas bsngags pa ste/ de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas/ /lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba/ gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod/ /gang las
141a6('dul ba): 'jigs su rung ba ste/ /yid 'byung ba yang gang las skye/ /zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang gis nga ni khyad gsod dang / gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa
141a7('dul ba): dang / gang las yid byung skyes pa dag /nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste/ /gal te 'di gsum yod min na/ /nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/ /yul rnams la ni
141b1('dul ba): dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba/ /legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs/ /khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/ /ji lta bur yang ma gos so/ /
141b2('dul ba): de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni/ /thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ /bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug /de nas rgyal po zas
141b3('dul ba): gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ /gang bdag gis bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar
141b4('dul ba): 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de thos pas zad dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun stong gis
141b5('dul ba): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so/ /lhas byin nga rgyal can las kyang nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas/ /khro
141b6('dul ba): ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra'i sgyu mas dbang du byed par shes na/ /bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig/ /de la shAkya rnams
141b7('dul ba): kyis bshes pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ /lhas byin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra zhig /ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'jug go/ /tshangs par bskor ba'i skyed
142a1('dul ba): mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs
142a2('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lhas byin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/ /ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs
142a3('dul ba): par/ /bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lhas sbyin dang de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/ /'khor lhag ma rnams las kha
142a4('dul ba): cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/
142a5('dul ba): kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung
142a6('dul ba): nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / /kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag kyang
142a7('dul ba): phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol/ /chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la 'bab par bkod do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar
142b1('dul ba): bcas pas mchod pa dang brjed pa dag/ mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/ /da lta ni mis mchod kyi lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /drang srong chen
142b2('dul ba): po smra mchog dam chos kyis/ /char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de/ /mi bzad lam du ltung ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag
142b3('dul ba): gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' bas bden pa mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa
142b4('dul ba): ma mthong snyam pa las de 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go /rgyu gnyis
142b5('dul ba): kyis bden pa mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba'o/ /de la zhum pa'i sems dang / shin tu dga' ba yid kyis ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug
142b6('dul ba): go snyam nas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang
142b7('dul ba): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ /bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang ba na bder song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'i dgal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po nas
143a1('dul ba): 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa
143a2('dul ba): legs so/ /btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
143a3('dul ba): chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang
143a4('dul ba): 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po'i
143a5('dul ba): lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go /cho 'phrul zung du yang
143a6('dul ba): ston par byed de/ /lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed la/ /lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ /lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed la/ /lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs
143a7('dul ba): par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam
143b1('dul ba): pa bzhi bstan nas/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du byas pa bsdus te/ gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun
143b2('dul ba): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu
143b3('dul ba): che ba dang gsum rig dang / /sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / /zag zad dgra bcom pa gang yin pa/ /thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba'
143b4('dul ba): zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas/ de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur te/ skabs
143b5('dul ba): der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na/ lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gi
143b6('dul ba): tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na
143b7('dul ba): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs
144a1('dul ba): pa mi shes na brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/ /srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di
144a2('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas
144a3('dul ba): de nas lha'i bu bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna ba bzhi'i khang pa
