144a4('dul ba): brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig / ko'u shi ka/ khyod kyi mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te/ n+ya
144a5('dul ba): gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to/ de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhin nga 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags
144a6('dul ba): skyes po dang / /mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po dang / shar sgo na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang rna cha gdub skor dang phreng ba dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /lho phyogs na
144a7('dul ba): ni 'phags skyes po lha'i brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis
144b1('dul ba): brgyan pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la don de
144b2('dul ba): rgyas par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du ma yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs te/ /lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung
144b3('dul ba): la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ /rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/ /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
144b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ /ci'i
144b5('dul ba): phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir 'gyur ba 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ /bzhin bzang khyod su zhig /rgyal po chen po bdag ni
144b6('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po mthong nas smras pa/ /rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis
144b7('dul ba): smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod su zhig /'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes po'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor de dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir 'gyur
145a1('dul ba): pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/ /rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par
145a2('dul ba): sdod cig / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ /bzhin bzang khyod su zhig/ /mig mi bzang gis smras pa/ /rgyal po chen po bdag mig mi bzang ngo / ci'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag
145a3('dul ba): pa la chos 'chad de/ /der mi 'gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug
145a4('dul ba): par sdod cig / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod su zhig/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o/ /ci'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa
145a5('dul ba): la chos 'chad de/ der mi gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de/ bdag gis lha'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa
145a6('dul ba): skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang zhum pa'i rgyud pa gang yin pa de bral bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na/ /khrag dron mo skyugs
145a7('dul ba): nas 'chi bar 'gyur pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis/ /de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de
145b1('dul ba): shel las byas par sprul pa dang / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
145b2('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags
145b3('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi po rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ /ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
145b4('dul ba): nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas/ /lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la phas ma bgyis/ /mas ma lags/
145b5('dul ba): rgyal pos ma lags/ /lha rnams kyis ma lags/ /sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ /dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ /sdug pa dang / /rang gi skye bo dang / /gnyen gyi tshogs
145b6('dul ba): kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ /rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ /ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/
145b7('dul ba): mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ /bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag go /yang gsol ba/ /pha la lan du phan gdags pa/ /dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang / /khyod kyis bdag la
146a1('dul ba): mdzad pa ste/ /sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis/ /khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/ /drangs te mtho ris thar pa la/ /bsgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te/
146a2('dul ba): khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs/ /mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni/ /bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar/ /mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yi/ /longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal
146a3('dul ba): po zas gtsang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
146a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu song bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang ma la
146a5('dul ba): cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
146a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/ zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu khyod rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig/
146a7('dul ba): ci'i slad du ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so/ /gang gi gdugs la lags/ de ring kho na'o/ /bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i
146b1('dul ba): kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa/ de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / de smras pa/ bdag
146b2('dul ba): gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya drug khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la
146b3('dul ba): rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang gang gis tshe bcom ldan 'das ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags
146b4('dul ba): so/ /gal te de ltar gyur na/ da su zhig rgyal srid la bzhag /de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la
146b5('dul ba): dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu'i
146b6('dul ba): snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol ba btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na
146b7('dul ba): bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi bkad sa gang na
147a1('dul ba): ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa
147a2('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'
147a3('dul ba): ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan
147a4('dul ba): 'das la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad pa/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis/ /shAkya
147a5('dul ba): rnams kyi bsams pa yi/ /yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni/ /rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de
147a6('dul ba): bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi
147a7('dul ba): de nyid na bzhugs so/ /nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/ nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge
147b1('dul ba): slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na/ dka' thub drag po'i brtul zhugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa can 'di
147b2('dul ba): dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/ lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las/ des bsams pa/ shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/ de nas shAkya
147b3('dul ba): thams cad bsags te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na cir 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yog bgyid par
147b4('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ rab tu byung zhig /ci thams cad dam/ khyim re nas re re'o/ /bka'
147b5('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ gang grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces de skad bka' stsal to/ /
147b6('dul ba): bre po zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang / ming chen no/ /ming chen ni zhing las kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no/ /ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas/ skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/
147b7('dul ba): dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /ming chen la mas smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces bsgos/ khyod rang tu byung zhig /des smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis khyod
148a1('dul ba): kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu byung zhig / bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig /yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod
148a2('dul ba): nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod/ de ring de la cung zad kyang ma bskur dang / ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam/ ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro/ /bu de bzhin du byas te/ yid ches par bya'o/ /des
148a3('dul ba): gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skegs la rgyas btab nas/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri dang / ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros
148a4('dul ba): shig / des de khyer nas song ba dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/ rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba
148a5('dul ba): gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya/ de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des rje'u de rnams su sran tshod dang / tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang zas kyis bkang ngo / /ji tsam na mngag
148a6('dul ba): gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang / des smras pa/ bu mo'i ni na ci yod/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so/ /ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams
148a7('dul ba): na/ 'di stong par ci ste bskur/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re zhig blta'o zhes ci tsam na kha phye ba dang / skyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur
148b1('dul ba): to/ /de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so/ /de ma la gus pa yin pas/ des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas spring pa/ yum gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi
148b2('dul ba): ba 'di lta bu sha stag bskur pa'i rigs so/ /des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/ des ming chen la bstan nas/ bu mthong ngam/ yum mthong lags so/ /khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang
148b3('dul ba): thang chen po'i sems can mi skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/ des smras pa/ yum bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung
148b4('dul ba): bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes de ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu byung bar khas len tu ma btub bo/ /de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su
148b5('dul ba): bcug pa/ shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces bsgo na khyod ci rab tu 'byung 'am/ 'on te khyim par 'dug /des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/
148b6('dul ba): khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /legs pa ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyim par
148b7('dul ba): 'dug par legs par bskyangs na/ lha dang / mi thob bo/ /ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags thob bo/ /yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni/ khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags
149a1('dul ba): pas/ de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu legs kyi de bzhin du gyis shig /ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla
149a2('dul ba): shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de'i drung du song ngo / /de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi wang len te/ de pi wang len pa na/ rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to/ /ma 'gags pa/ pi wang
149a3('dul ba): len pa la byang ba yin pas/ des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de sgor bsdad de/ sgo srung gi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong
149a4('dul ba): par 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig / sgo srung song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/ lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgo na sdod cing mchis
149a5('dul ba): so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog /shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong zhig /de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste/ smras pa/ khyod 'ongs nas
149a6('dul ba): ji srid lon/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyod pi wang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so/ /de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ des smras pa/ khyod pi wang len pa la byang ba yin no/ /shAkya'i
149a7('dul ba): rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shAkya rnams la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung
149b1('dul ba): zhig par bsgo bas/ de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltar na kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob cig /des
149b2('dul ba): de nyid du gnas btab bo/ /mal cha bas rims bag gi dri can gyi gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang / de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams
149b3('dul ba): su myong nas smras pa/ ci 'di'i 'og na rdo phre'u yod dam/ de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams pa na/ me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /ma 'gags pas mtshan mo mi bde
149b4('dul ba): bzhin nyal nas nam nangs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ma 'gags pa/ cig bde bar gnyid log gam/ des smras pa/ lha bde bar gnyid ma log go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ ma 'gags pas
149b5('dul ba): smras pa/ lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus snad lags so/ /rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas/ khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos
149b6('dul ba): bting ste ci bya/ mal 'cha' bas smras pa/ lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so/ /rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis rigs bag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya/ des
149b7('dul ba): smras pa/ lha bdag la tha ga pas gtad pa lags so/ /rgyal pos thag pa bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos dbul/ tha ga pas smras pa/ lha snam bu 'thag pa'i
150a1('dul ba): 'phro cung zhig lus pa na/ bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis ci ltar shes/ des smras pa/ tsha ba'i reg pa
150a2('dul ba): nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri lags so/ /rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya'i skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas
150a3('dul ba): shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na lhas byin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur te/ de shAkya rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la
150a4('dul ba): bdag cag thams cad 'dus la/ lha sbyin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste/ de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/ lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad
150a5('dul ba): rab tu 'byung na/ khyod ci byed/ lhas byin gyis bsams pa/ gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig
150a6('dul ba): bsham par bya ste bslu'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i
150a7('dul ba): tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas smras pa/ khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis
150b1('dul ba): bsams pa/ 'di ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyis/ dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la bris nas/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir
150b2('dul ba): dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lhas byin la sogs te/ shAkya lnga brgya rab tu
150b3('dul ba): 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/ thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba bskyed cig /ces bsgo'o/ /lhas byin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang / yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis shAkya'i
150b4('dul ba): rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur dang / bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni gal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi
150b5('dul ba): 'gyur bas/ thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam cis rab tu byung la bdag rab tu 'byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/
150b6('dul ba): shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas/ des grong khyer de gseg ma dang gyo mo bsal/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan bsgreng / dar
150b7('dul ba): gyi chun 'phyangs mang po dbyangs/ shin tu dri zhim po'i phog phor nye bar bzhag /me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ldan byed du bcug go/ /de nas shAkya brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su
151a1('dul ba): bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo na seng+ge'i khri la 'dug go / shAkya mo dang shAkya gzhon nu ma ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang / skar khung khol ma can dang / skar khung dang /
151a2('dul ba): stegs bu dag la 'dug go /shAkya rnams kyi 'byor pa la lta bar 'dod pa'i skye bo'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum
151a3('dul ba): mdo rnams su 'dug go / shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /su dag gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa'i phyir/ bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan dag pa bkug go/
151a4('dul ba): shAkya rnams do shal dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang ma dag las bltas nas so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ shAkya'i rgyal po
151a5('dul ba): bzang ldan sna la byung ba/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ re zhig 'dis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba dang /
151a6('dul ba): de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas lhas byin phyir byung ste/ de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras
151a7('dul ba): pa| 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /ko ka li ka dang / khan dra ba bya dang / ka ta mo ra ka ti sha dang / rgya mtshos byin rnams phyir 'byung ba
151b1('dul ba): na bong bu'i skad grag nas/ de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /nye dga' glang
151b2('dul ba): po che la zhon pas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na/ mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang / de glang po che las babs te blangs so/ /de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal
151b3('dul ba): ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams skyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom
151b4('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung na/ kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ kha cig
151b5('dul ba): gis ni mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/ mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma yin pas ma la ngas thams cad
151b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya
151b7('dul ba): rnams gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to/ /rgyal
152a1('dul ba): po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na/ skra 'dreg par btang nas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'dreg pa na/
152a2('dul ba): de ngom zug gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag la skad 'dzer cing dbugs brdzangs por skra 'dreg par byed do/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir ngu / de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung
152a3('dul ba): ngur dal bus tshig re nas smras pa/ lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa/ mi phal pa rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'gyur ba lta zhig /khyed kyis
152a4('dul ba): spangs te gson pas ni gum mi bsngo'o/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig /ngas ci lta mi phal pa
152a5('dul ba): rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ des phyogs gcig tu ras shig bting nas shAkya gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig /'dreg mkhan
152a6('dul ba): nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis/ rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog cig /de rnams kyi se mo do dang do shal dang mgul
152a7('dul ba): rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so/ /nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams
152b1('dul ba): mthar gyis skra bregs te/ de rnams khrus la dong ba dang / des bsams pa/ re zhig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas
152b2('dul ba): pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i
152b3('dul ba): chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang / 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/
152b4('dul ba): ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas/ tshe dang ldan
152b5('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na bder song ste phyin nas/ 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces
152b6('dul ba): smras so/ /nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug/ nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang gi phyir da
152b7('dul ba): ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa
153a1('dul ba): ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing chu bo las rgal
153a2('dul ba): ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras
153a3('dul ba): pa| bzhin bzang thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin/ rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar
153a4('dul ba): thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/ /rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad/ /'das nas yun ring lon pa yi/ /las
153a5('dul ba): rnams la ni rtog par mdzad/ /gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
153a6('dul ba): sngar 'dong dang / khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po go gnyis pa/ des khas blang so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar
153a7('dul ba): 'khor 'khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa nye bar
153b1('dul ba): 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags na/ thugs brtse bar nye bar gzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
153b2('dul ba): rab tu dbyung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
153b3('dul ba): stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs
153b4('dul ba): nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas
153b5('dul ba): gyur te/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams ni rgan rabs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud par byed pas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na/ nye bar
153b6('dul ba): 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so/ /de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na/ ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang 'dud par bgyi'am/ bcom
153b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rgan gyis khyod kyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa chog la thud cig /des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu/
154a1('dul ba): g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub
154a2('dul ba): phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'
154a3('dul ba): bar gyur te/ de ltar thams cad kyis rim bzhin du gtugs so/ /lhas byin gyis ma btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis
154a4('dul ba): thud cig/ des gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes de 'dud du ma btub ste/ de thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lhas byin gyis bcag go//
154a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor la phyag bgyis pa dang / sa chen
154a6('dul ba): po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/ 'di ltar
154a7('dul ba): 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba/
154b1('dul ba): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du bcug go /de'i tshe wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na smad tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba zhig gnas
154b2('dul ba): pa de'i drung du bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' zhes bya ba song nas smras pa/ bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog /des smras pa/ khyod la kar sha pa na lnga brgya yod dam/ des smras pa/ med
154b3('dul ba): do| |song la kar sha pa na lnga brgya khyer te shog cig / de la 'byor pa med kyang de de la lhag par chags pas/ dus dus su me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bskyel bar byed pa dang / de de la
154b4('dul ba): sdug pa skyes so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na wA ra Na sir dus ston byung nas bud med thams cad gos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas/ rang gi khyim na rtse zhing dga' ba mang pos
154b5('dul ba): gnas pa de/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dgas thos nas yi chad par gyur to/ /smad 'tshong ma bzang mos bsams pa/ de ring wA ra NA si'i mi rnams gos dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klubs
154b6('dul ba): nas rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur na/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' su zhig dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur zhes de de snyam du sems shing / bram ze'i
154b7('dul ba): khye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des de mthong ba dang / sngon gyi byas pa drin du gzo bas yid bde ba skyed nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u song la shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog
155a1('dul ba): dag khyer te shog cig / bdag cag lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/ /de shi ba las sos pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ngo mtshar gyis bsdus nas song ngo / /de'i
155a2('dul ba): gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / g.yer ba'i yon tan la brtags nas myos shing zhen pas mtshan thog thag gnyid ma log pas nam nangs pa dang / mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin tu lci bar gyur nas/ ji tsam
155a3('dul ba): nyi ma shar gyi bar du gnyid log nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi dus ston gyi ched du me tog thams cad btus zin pa de'i tshe sad nas me tog gi ched du phan tshun song ba na/ ma rnyed nas des shing shi ri sha zhes bya
155a4('dul ba): ba'i me tog gcig khyer nas de'i drung du song ste/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ g.yang gzhi thogs pa phu pho mdzes dga' ni/ /ma sha phyed med rgyud zhan snyoms las kyis/ /de ring shing rnams me tog
155a5('dul ba): rgyas dus na'ang / /sbyin pa'i me tog shir sha 'di yin no/ /des smras pa/ song la me tog gzhan dag khyer la shog cig /'dod pa rnams la so sor rten par byed pa ni kun tu sbyong ba la sogs
155a6('dul ba): te| de'i 'dod chags rab tu 'phel bas/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma'i nyin par sprin med cing rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang / grong khyer nas shin tu thag ring ba'i yul dgon pa dag tu
155a7('dul ba): mgo 'dren pa dang dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len cing me tog thu'o/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ri dwags shor du chas pa na/ de nyi ma'i 'od zer rnon pos gdungs nas grib ma'i ched du phyogs der son pa
155b1('dul ba): na de'i glu'i sgra thos nas tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ steng nas nyi mas gdungs byed cing / /'og nas bye mas gdungs pa la/ /glu len khyod kyi lus la ni/ /ci'i phyir nyi ma'i gdungs pa
155b2('dul ba): med| |mdzes dgas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni nyi mas ma gdungs te/ /rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs lags/ /bya ba bya ba ma yin pas/ /'jig rten 'di gdungs nyi
155b3('dul ba): ma min/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar bsil bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yin te/ des na nyi ma phyed kyi tshe 'dug nas me tog thu'o snyam nas/
155b4('dul ba): des de bkug ste smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re zhig bsil bar byed pa'i gtam dag byos shig /mnyam to/ /des bsams pa/ rgyal po de ni gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa yin te/
155b5('dul ba): des na 'di skad ces smra'o snyam nas/ des bsil bar byed pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs de la smras pa thos nas/ rgyal po lus kyi gdung ba dang bral bar 'gyur to/ /rgyal po mngon par dga'
155b6('dul ba): bar gyur nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i srog sbyin pa gang yin pa de la lan du phan ci gdags/ lha rgyal srid kyi phyed
155b7('dul ba): kyis so/ /de nas rgyal po des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas thob cig dang / sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbyin no/ /de rgyal po'i pho brang du mal bzang po byin nas de de la nyal
156a1('dul ba): ba na/ bzang mo rjes su dran par sems shing rgyal srid phyed po de yang smad 'tshong ma bzang mo'i phyir blang ngo snyam mo/ /yang bsams pa/ rgyal srid phyed
156a2('dul ba): po de la longs spyod pa'i rgyal po de ci 'dra ba zhig / ma la bdag gis de srog dang bral bar bya'o snyam mo/ /yang bsams pa/ rgyal po bsad pa'i rgyal srid gang yin pa des ci zhig bya
156a3('dul ba): snyam nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ don ma grub na 'dod 'gyur la/ /don grub 'dod pa ldog mi 'gyur/ /ma grub na ni phongs gyur pas/ /de bas don ni don ma yin/ /ji tsam
156a4('dul ba): nam nangs su nye ba na/ de 'gyod pa skyes nas mal nas babs te g.yang gzhis la bting nas nyal lo/ /nam nangs pa na rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u de khug cig /
156a5('dul ba): de la rgyal srid phyed sbyin no/ /rgyal po'i pho nya dag 'ongs pa na mal chen po nas babs te/ g.yang gzhis la bting nas nyal ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ma dad pa skyed de rgyal po'i gan du
156a6('dul ba): song nas smras pa/ lha 'di ni rgyal srid kyi 'os ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha nyon mongs mal chen po gya nom pa spangs te/ g.yang gzhi
156a7('dul ba): sa la bting nas mchis/ nyal ba'i dman pa la mos pa gang lags pa de la rgyal srid stsal te cir rung / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /shes rab can de de la rgyu zhig yod
156b1('dul ba): bar 'gyur gyis khug cig / de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ kye bram ze'i khye'u khyod ci'i phyir mal chen po las babs te/ g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal/ des
156b2('dul ba): ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas nas/ de smras pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te khyod rab tu byung nas
156b3('dul ba): khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs pa nga la brjod pa lta na gnang ngo / /des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs so/ /de nas des zhi ba'i phyogs su song nas mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang
156b4('dul ba): byang chub rtogs par byas na/ rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal po de la sngon khas blangs pas song la/ khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o zhes de rgyal po'i drung du song nas steng gi
156b5('dul ba): nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te tshigs
156b6('dul ba): su bcad pas smras pa/ dge ba ci zhig btsal phyir rab byung ba'i/ /bram ze'i khye'u yis rnyed pa legs rnyed de/ /cung zad las kyi rnam smin bskyed pa yi/ /nyer 'gros khyad par chen po 'dir rtogs
156b7('dul ba): ltos| |rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi skra mkhan gang+gA skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de/ des mdzes dgas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa 'dzin du bcug nas smras pa/ gang+gA skyong nga la tshigs su bcad pa de
157a1('dul ba): yang dang yang du dran par gyis shig / skra mkhan gang+gA skyong rang gi bzo la shin tu byang ba yin pas de gang gi tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi kha spu 'chos pa de'i tshe gnyid log
157a2('dul ba): par 'gyur zhing se gol gyis sad par byas te/ sad nas kyang gang+gA skyong nga la mchog gang 'dod pa gsol cig ces mchog sbyin par byed pa na des smras pa/ lha gsol ba zhig mchis so/ /
157a3('dul ba): gang gi tshe gang+gA skyong gis rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa dran par byed pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po 'dod pa'i gtam la sems kyang mi 'gro na/ 'dod pa zhen cing spyod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ btsun
157a4('dul ba): mo la lta bar yang mi byed do/ /btsun mo rnams nyon mongs pas myos shing zhen nas gang+gA skyong la smras pa/ zhang po gang gi tshe khyod la lhas mchog sbyin par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ lhas gal te bdag la
157a5('dul ba): dgyes na/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don rgyas par bshad du gsol zhes gsol cig/ rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa de'i don rgyas par rnam par bkrol ba dang / de skyo ba skyes nas rkang pa la gtugs
157a6('dul ba): te smras pa/ lha bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyis lags kyis/ khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te rab tu byung nas yon tan gyi tshigs cung zad thob
157a7('dul ba): na nga la rig par byos shig / des smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/ snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o/ /de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung ste/ des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon
157b1('dul ba): sum du byas so/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin la sngon khas blangs kyis song la khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o snyam nas/ de rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste
157b2('dul ba): phyin nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul
157b3('dul ba): la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/ rtogs so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis drang srong gang+gA skyong gi rkang
157b4('dul ba): pa la gtugs pa na/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /yang de'i mas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshangs sbyin blo dang ldan pa po/ /'di ru 'dreg mkhan lag ca dag /bzhag nas rab tu byung 'di
157b5('dul ba): la| |lha khyod 'dud pa'i tshul ma yin/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi mas khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di ltar thub pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la/ /des ni dka' spyad 'di dag spyad
157b6('dul ba): lags te/ /blo rgya chen por gyur pa gang lags pa/ /gang+gA skyong la chung zad ma gsungs shig /dka' thub zil gyis sdig pa thams cad mnan/ /dka' thub zil gyis 'jig rten thams cad mnan/ /dka' thub
157b7('dul ba): zil gyis 'dreg mkhan snod bcom ste/ /dka' thub 'bar la cung zad ma gsung shig/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de bzang ldan 'di
158a1('dul ba): nyid yin no/ /drang srong gang+gA skyong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ nye bar 'khor 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan tshangs sbyin du gyur pa na/ nye bar 'khor drang
